column2: The caster draws the chill from the depths of her heart and lets it fill every inch of her body. She becomes cold to the touch and even more pallid than before, and her skin becomes hard and resilient.
The caster lowers the temperature of her body. She is immune to exposure caused by freezing conditions and is immune to damage from cold-based attacks.
The Wizard is instantly covered by a translucent layer of luminous ice that moulds around their bodies and protects them from the blows of the enemy.
The Wizards channels mighty flows of cold into the land. A heavy frost immediately crusts over every affected surface, halving all movement for those in or moving through the area.
With a single breath, the caster blows a freezing gale at anyone in front of her within 48 yards.
The Wizard unleashes one to ten diamond-hard shards of ice at a target. Each shard is a potent magic missile.
A swirling flurry of snow and ice rises from the land, freezing and blinding all in its path. The caster can cast blizzard at any point she can see.
A swirling flurry of snow and ice rises from the land, freezing and blinding all in its path. The caster can cast blizzard at any point she can see.
